name: ride
chn: vt. & vi. 骑; 驾驶; 搭乘. n. (乘车、骑马等的) 短途旅程
example_en: She loves to ride her bicycle in the park every weekend.
example_cn: 她喜欢每个周末在公园里骑自行车。
word_family: rider (n. 骑手), riding (n. 骑马), ride out (v. 安然度过)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'rīdan'，意为'骑'。联想记忆：想象自己骑在马上或自行车上，感受风从耳边呼啸而过的感觉。图像记忆：可以想象一个孩子骑在旋转木马上，快乐地笑着。

image_prompt.main_image: A young girl riding a bicycle in a sunny park, with trees and flowers in the background.
image_prompt.example_image: A woman riding a horse on a beach at sunset, with waves crashing in the background.

collocations: ride a bike (骑自行车); free ride (搭便车); take for a ride (欺骗)
